bibl.title: The Historia Apollonii Regis Tyri and Ancient Astrology. A Possible Link between Apollonius and κατοχή.
bibl.note: Paper read at the Dartmouth College conference "The Ancient Novel" (July 23-29, 1989). - Considers Apollonius as κάτοχος in Egypt. - See in part. pp. 76-79: 3. The concept of κάτοχος.
bibl.seg: KORTEKAAS G.A.A., The Historia Apollonii Regis Tyri and Ancient Astrology. A Possible Link between Apollonius and κατοχή.
Paper read at the Dartmouth College conference "The Ancient Novel" (July 23-29, 1989). - Considers Apollonius as κάτοχος in Egypt. - See in part. pp. 76-79: 3. The concept of κάτοχος.
